alert.note: Alert for Coke; Crockett; Fisher; Haskell; Irion; Jones; Nolan; Runnels; Schleicher; Shackelford; Sterling; Throckmorton; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 12 at 10:29AM CDT until May 13 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: .An upper-level storm system will move into the southern Plains today and remain there through the weekend. An unstable airmass in place today will help to generate widespread thunderstorms this afternoon and evening. These storms are expected to merge into a line and move very slowly through west central Texas during the overnight hours, which will lead to heavy rainfall concerns. Another round of heavy rain and thunderstorms is expected for Saturday. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of west central Texas, including the following counties, Coke, Crockett, Fisher, Haskell, Irion, Jones, Nolan, Runnels, Schleicher, Shackelford, Sterling, Taylor, Throckmorton and Tom Green. * WHEN...From 7 PM CDT this evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Expect heavy rainfall and possible flash flooding due to an upper level disturbance moving across, abundant low and mid level moisture and a cold front moving through. Rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible with locally higher amounts. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Coke; Crockett; Fisher; Haskell; Irion; Jones; Nolan; Runnels; Schleicher; Shackelford; Sterling; Throckmorton; Tom Green
